title: Country Cheese Snacks
summary: Country Cheese Snacks might be just the hor d'oeuvre you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains around 3g of protein, 20g of fat, and a total of 198 calories. This recipe serves 16. For 72 cents per serving, this recipe covers 4% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A mixture of parsley sprigs, muffins, green onions, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 15 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 14%. This score is rather bad. Similar recipes include Homemade Gummy Fruit Snacks (Healthy Snacks for Kids), Ham & Cheese Pizza Snacks, and Sausage Cheese Snacks.
instructions: Directions                                                                                In a small bowl, combine first four ingredients. Spread on bread; place on a baking sheet.                                                                                            Broil 4 in. from the heat until golden and bubbly, about 1-2 minutes. Garnish with parsley and olives. Serve immediately.                                        Yield: 2 cups spread.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Country Cheese Snacks in  CountryApril/May 1992, p51                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (2 tablespoons) equals 173 calories, 17 g fat (6 g saturated fat), 25 mg cholesterol, 210 mg sodium, 1 g carbohydrate, trace fiber, 3 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a small bowl, combine first four ingredients.
Spread on bread; place on a baking sheet.
Broil 4 in. from the heat until golden and bubbly, about 1-2 minutes.
